speaker: President.
english: President. The next item is the report by José Manuel García-Margallo y Marfil, on behalf of the Committee on Economic and Monetary Affairs, on the 2006 annual report on the euro area ( 2006/2239 (INI) ) ( A6-0381/2006 ).
